column5: This comfortable loft is amazingly situated to enjoy the best that Houston has to offer. You can sleep up to 6 people in this modern apartment. One king bed, 1 couch bed, and 1 futon. Also has a great workspace/desk. It is a super easy walk across the street to BBVA Compass Stadium, 2 block to George R Brown Convention Center, 3 blocks to Minute Maid Park, and a 5 minute Uber ride to the Toyota Center. You can be in Downtown in minutes for the best restaurants, bars, and coffee shops!
column8: Only 2 Block to GRB Downtown Houston Condo Sleep 6
